data.title: Meet the Team at Lakeview Dental Care
data.meta_description: Looking for a skilled, compassionate & experienced doctors? Call Lakeview Dental Care in Cherry Hill, Linwood, Gibbsboro, & Haddon Heights, NJ.
data.text:
Meet Our Exceptional Dentists

At Lakeview Dental Care, we are a team of caring, experienced dental professionals who use only the most advanced technologies, materials & procedures.

Jonathan S. Hill, DMD

Dr. Jonathan Hill was born & raised in Cherry Hill, New Jersey. After high school, he went on to Saint Joseph’s University in Philadelphia to study biology with a minor in fine art. Following college, he merged his art skills & love of science by pursuing a career in medical illustration. Subsequent to strengthening his portfolio at the Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts, Dr. Hill went on to acquire a masters degree in medical illustration from the Medical College of Georgia. While there, he received two awards for his excellence in medical illustration. After two years of professional illustration, he decided to apply his skills to dentistry.

Since his graduation from Temple University School of Dentistry, he has been working in private practice as a general dentist in the South Jersey area. He is proficient in family & cosmetic dentistry, as well as endodontics, oral surgery, invisalign & implantology. Patients have come to know Dr. Hill for his gentle touch & comforting chairside manner.

Dr. Hill & his wife Aneta live in Meford, New Jersey, with their young children Matthew, Daniel, Julianna, & Christian.

Eric J. Forte, DMD

Dr. Eric Forte was born in Voorhees, New Jersey, & is one of the driving forces behind Lakeview Dental Care. He graduated from Drexel University in 1996 with a degree in graphic design. Clearly, this was an unusual path toward dentistry, but Dr. Forte’s talents & expertise in art are what fueled his love of dentistry & the beauty of the smile. He graduated from Temple University School of Dentistry in 2002, earning many honors & awards, including:

Temple University School of Dentistry / Crown & Bridge Award, 2002

International College of Dentists USA Section / Award for Outstanding Professionalism & Clinical Excellence in Dentistry, 2002

Temple University School of Dentistry / Dean’s Scholarship for Outstanding Performance, 1998

Dr. Forte acquired his practice in 2005, & has since grown the practice considerably. His expertise is in practicing highly proficient dentistry while making each & every individual feel cared for. Dr. Forte is highly skilled & experienced in all aspects of general & cosmetic dentistry, including endodontics, veneers, crown & bridge, & implant placement & restorations. Dr. Forte’s ability, enthusiasm, & professionalism show in his dedication to the patients.

Dr. Forte has recently moved to Medford, NJ, with his loving wife Jennifer & their beautiful daughters Isabella & Brielle.

Michael Massoud, DMD

Dr. Michael Massoud attended Rutgers University to earn his Bachelor of Arts in Biological Sciences. He then completed his dental education at Temple University, where he received his Doctor of Dental Medicine degree. Dr. Massoud chose to become a dentist because of the combination of art & science, & because he enjoys developing great doctor-patient relationships. His professional philosophy is to treat patients like family & provide the best possible dentistry. He is an active member of the American Dental Association & the American Dental Education Association. He continues his education by taking courses in implantology & maintains Invisalign certification. In his spare time, Dr. Massoud enjoys soccer, going to the gym, spending time with family & friends, going to the beach & exploring cities.

Joel Hasbun, DMD

Dr. Joel Hasbun was born & raised in South Jersey by Dominican parents. He obtained his Bachelors in Biology from The College of New Jersey. He then attended Rutgers School of Dental Medicine & received his DMD degree. During his senior year, he provided dental care to underserved communities in the area, where he would see medically compromised patients on regular basis. Dr. Hasbun believes in providing quality dental care to his patients while establishing long-lasting relationships with them. He regularly takes continuing education courses to make sure he stays up to date with the latest techniques & materials used in all facets of dentistry. It is very important to him to create a stress-free environment for all of his patients & to help them stay well-informed. He is an active member of the American Dental Association, Academy of General Dentistry, New Jersey Dental Association & the Southern New Jersey Dental Society. In his free time, Dr. Hasbun enjoys watching & playing sports, listening to several types of music, staying fit & traveling.

Ashley Nelson, DMD

Dr. Ashley Nelson grew up locally in Medford, New Jersey. She earned her dental degree from Temple University Kornberg School of Dentistry in Philadelphia, where she graduated magna cum laude & received the Dr. Anthony A. Campanella Award for Academic Excellence. She also holds a bachelor’s degree in biology from Fairleigh Dickinson University, where she was a member of Theta Phi Alpha & the Beta Beta Beta Biological Honors Society. Dr. Nelson believes in providing conservative, comprehensive dentistry for her patients in a comfortable & pleasant atmosphere. Dr. Nelson is an active member of the New Jersey Dental Association & the American Dental Association. When she is not practicing dentistry, she & her husband enjoy cooking, attending concerts, traveling & spending time with their family.

Gaurav Shah, DMD

Dr. Gaurav Shah was born & raised in New Jersey. He obtained his Bachelor’s degree in cell biology & neuroscience from Rutgers University in New Brunswick after three years. He then went on to attend Rutgers School of Dental Medicine in Newark where he received his Doctor of Dental Medicine degree.

While studying in Dental School, Dr. Shah spent part of his free time researching & staying up to date with the most current topics in dentistry. His research has earned him multiple honors & awards such as: a seat as an oral session chair presenter at the International Association for Dental Research in San Francisco; the Omicron Kappa Upsilon Certificate for Excellence in Research; & the New York Academy of Dentistry’s Summer Research Grant. Following graduation, Dr. Shah continued his formal training & honed his skills by pursuing a General Practice Residency at Monmouth Medical Center in Long Branch. He enjoys providing comprehensive treatment to all his patients with a cool, calm & collected demeanor.

Outside of the dental office, Dr. Shah enjoys spending time in nature, staying fit, reading & spending time with family & friends

Stefanie Fetters, DMD

Dr. Stefanie Fetters is originally from Delaware County, Pennsylvania. She graduated from Temple University with an undergraduate degree in biology. Dr. Fetters pursued an Expanded Functions Dental Assisting degree, which grew her love of dentistry & ultimately led her to become a dentist. She returned to Temple University for her Doctor of Dental Medicine degree.

Dr. Fetters is well versed in all aspects of general dentistry, with a focus on providing a relaxing experience for even the most anxious patients. As her patient, you can expect your fears to be put at ease & detailed attention to be paid to your treatment. Each year, she takes many hours of continuing education to stay current with the latest technology & science-based treatment recommendations.

Dr. Fetters resides in Cherry Hill with her husband & baby cockatiel parrot. In their free time, they like to travel & experience new adventures!

Robert Carlson, DDS

Dr. Robert Carlson grew up in many places, as his father was in the U.S. Army. Eventually his family settled in New Orleans. After graduating high school, Dr. Carlson proudly served in the United States Marine Corps. He is a veteran of the Persian Gulf War. Upon his return from service, he began his dental career by earning his Associate of Dental Technology degree. Ultimately he decided to become a dentist because he wanted to be more involved in patient care. In 2004 Dr. Carlson received his bachelor’s degree in biological science from Louisiana State University in Baton Rouge. Soon after, he earned his Doctor of Dental Surgery degree from Louisiana State University School of Dentistry.

With new dental techniques & technologies constantly being developed, Dr. Carlson believes that continuing education is vital to remaining a top dentist. He continues his own education with such prestigious organizations as the MISCH Institute, the Center for Advanced Dental Education, Progressive Orthodontics, Invisalign, CEREC & the Pankey Institute. Dr. Carlson is a member of the American Dental Association, the New Jersey Dental Association, the Academy of General Dentistry, the International Congress of Oral Implantologists & the LSU Alumni Association.

Dr. Carlson has been married to his wife Victoria for over 35 years, & together they have one daughter, Vivianne. His hobbies include woodworking, puzzles & games with his family, & outdoor activities like fishing & volleyball.

Kevin Cheng, DMD

Dr. Kevin Cheng was born in Brooklyn, NY & grew up in East Brunswick, NJ. He completed an accelerated seven-year dental program where he earned both his Bachelor of Science in Biology at the New Jersey Institute of Technology, & his Doctor of Dental Medicine at the Rutgers School of Dental Medicine in Newark, NJ. Following dental school, Dr. Cheng furthered his training by completing a General Practice Residency at the Hackensack University Medical Center. While participating in this advanced training program, Dr. Cheng focused on comprehensive treatment planning & multidisciplinary dental care.

Dr. Cheng is passionate about helping patients, committed to clinical excellence, & focused on providing a high standard of care. He enjoys creating a calm environment for patients & working with them to solve problems. Dr. Cheng is an active member of the American Dental Association & the New Jersey Dental Association. He participates in continuing education opportunities throughout the year to learn the latest techniques in dentistry.

Outside of dentistry, Dr. Cheng is passionate about health & fitness & enjoys working out at the gym & hiking. He can also be found reading & spending time with family & friends

Ta’Ronn Simpson, DDS

Dr. Ta’Ronn L. Simpson is a proud native of South Jersey. He grew up in Mt. Laurel & attended Lenape Regional High School. After graduating, Dr. Simpson went on to study Microbiology & Chemistry at the University of Miami. He then received his graduate degree in Oral Biology from the University of California, Los Angeles before attending Howard University College of Dentistry in Washington, D.C.

Dr. Simpson offers a broad scope of care to his patients. He is skilled in crowns, bridges, root canals, extractions, dentures, Invisalign & implant dentistry. He has a love of continuing education courses & hopes to one day teach as a dental school professor.

Dr. Simpson is fortunate to have lived in many areas of the country & to have met different people from all walks of life. He is a passionate Philadelphia sports fan & enjoys track & field, & Formula One racing as well. His hobbies include traveling, art history, cooking & aviation.

Molly Fraser, DMD

Dr. Molly Makos Fraser was born & raised in South Jersey. She received her undergraduate degree from Clemson University (Go Tigers!) before completing her dental education at the University of Pennsylvania. Dr. Fraser graduated with honors in radiology & earned a dual degree with a Master of Science in higher education. She achieved membership in University of Pennsylvania’s Matthew Cryer Honor Society, as well as the national dental honor society, Omicron Kappa Upsilon. Dr. Fraser completed a general practice residency at Albert Einstein Medical Center & has been working in private practice ever since.

Dr. Fraser has undergone advanced training in endodontics, pediatric dentistry & implant dentistry. She is an active member of several professional organizations, including the American Dental Association, the Academy of General Dentistry & the New Jersey State Dental Association. As her patient, you can expect to have your concerns heard & leave with knowledge of the best available options for your individualized treatment.

Dr. Molly Makos Fraser & her husband were recently married & bought a home in Philadelphia, where they reside with their “pandemic pup,” Murph. Outside of the office, Dr. Fraser loves trying new local restaurants, cooking, running, traveling, & cheering on every Philadelphia sports team.

Allison Seigel, DMD

Dr. Allison Seigel attended Temple University where she earned her Bachelor of Science in biology, with a business minor in healthcare management. She further pursued her education at Tufts University School of Dental Medicine where she graduated Magna Cum Laude.

Dr. Seigel prioritizes the comfort of her patients & is devoted to providing a stress-free environment during all procedures. She is deeply passionate about dentistry & is committed to delivering high-quality, comprehensive care. While she appreciates all aspects of her field, Dr. Seigel has a particular interest in cosmetic dentistry, such as composite bonding, porcelain veneers, as well as crowns & bridges. Dr. Seigel has an eye for the art of dentistry & executes these fine details with a gentle hand. To stay current with the latest techniques, materials & technologies, Dr. Seigel regularly attends continuing education courses. She is an active member of the American Dental Association & Academy of General Dentistry.

Outside of her professional life, Dr. Seigel enjoys practicing yoga, going on walks & runs, spending quality time with friends & family, dining out & exploring her culinary skills in the kitchen.

Dr. Seigel looks forward to meeting your individual healthcare needs!

Amr Abdalla, DMD

Dr. Amr Abdalla was born in Egypt & grew up in Jersey City, where his passion for helping others & pursuing a career in dentistry first began. He completed his undergraduate studies at Rutgers University where he received his Bachelor of Science in biology. He then went on to Rutgers School of Dental Medicine. While there, Dr. Abdalla took advantage of every opportunity to develop his skills & knowledge in providing exceptional dental care.

Dr. Abdalla was among a select group of students chosen to complete his fourth year of dental school at a community-based externship where he treated medically complex patients. This invaluable experience taught Dr. Abdalla how to handle challenging cases & the importance of creating a comfortable & positive patient experience for everyone.

When not caring for patients, Dr. Abdalla can be found playing soccer or working out. He enjoys maintaining a healthy lifestyle, which he believes is crucial to providing exceptional patient care. Additionally, Dr. Abdalla cherishes spending time with loved ones as they are his consistent support & inspiration.

Charles Wu, DDS

Dr. Charles Wu was born in Taiwan & immigrated as a young child to Queens, NY. He

received his Bachelor of Arts degree from the University of Michigan before returning east to

attend the SUNY Stony Brook School of Dental Medicine. Following dental school, Dr. Wu

furthered his training by completing a General Practice Residency at Booth Memorial Hospital

in Flushing, NY. This advanced training honed Dr. Wu’s skills in all aspects of clinical dentistry.

Prior to joining Lakeview Dental Care, Dr. Wu was in private practice for 10 years

serving the people of Washington Township. As a nurturing & compassionate individual, Dr. Wu is committed to making the dental experience pleasurable & productive for each of his patients. Outside of dentistry, Dr. Wu enjoys spending time with his family, hiking, surfing & music.

Ann Liu, DMD

Dr. Ann Liu was born in Louisiana & raised in Texas. She attended the University of Texas at Austin’s McCombs School of Business where she majored in Management with a minor in Biology. Dr. Liu knew she loved healthcare & wanted to help people in tangible ways. This passion led her to Temple University’s Kornberg School of Dentistry where she earned her doctorate. Following graduation, she chose to complete a residency program at Montefiore Medical Center in New York.

Since finishing her training, Dr. Liu has remained committed to staying up to date on the latest advancements in dentistry & dental technology. She is well known for her commitment to her patients’ needs. Dr. Liu focuses on enhancing patients’ dental knowledge so they can make well-informed decisions – all while ensuring them a stress-free experience.

Outside of the office, Dr. Liu spends her free time with family & friends. She enjoys hobbies, such as cooking, reading, photography & traveling.

Peter Hoang, DMD

Dr. Peter Hoang is local to South Jersey & was raised in Pennsauken. After graduating from Pennsauken High School, he went to Rutgers University in New Brunswick & obtained a bachelor’s degree in exercise science. He then went on to receive his Doctor of Dental Medicine degree from Rutgers School of Dental Medicine. Dr. Hoang spent his fourth year of dental school at the University Dental Center in Somerdale, NJ, providing dental care to medically complex patients & underserved populations.

Dr. Hoang is compassionate & understanding with his patients, ensuring that they have a positive experience & that their concerns are addressed. Having spent most of his life in South Jersey, Dr. Hoang is passionate about providing the highest standard of dental care for this community.

When he is not practicing dentistry, Dr. Hoang enjoys staying active by powerlifting, playing volleyball & running. He spends most of his weekends going to church & cheering for the Eagles!

Michael Bundy, DMD

Dr. Michael Bundy received his degree in biology from Clarion University where he was also a member of their wrestling team. He then attended Temple University School of Dentistry, class of 1998. Following graduation, he was commissioned as a Dental Officer in the United States Navy. Dr. Bundy served on active duty for four years, with three of them being overseas at Naval Air Station Sigonella, Sicily, Italy.

After his military service, he worked as a Clinical Director in Oregon & New Jersey before opening his private practice in Medford. Always interested in the business aspect of dentistry, Dr. Bundy helped build a six-office general dentistry group where he served as Chief Clinical Officer & later Chief Executive Officer. Most recently, he was the Chief Clinical Officer for a nine-location general & specialty group in Pennsylvania.

Dr. Bundy is proficient in all areas of family & cosmetic dentistry with an emphasis on oral surgery & implants. He has an enthusiastic attitude toward practicing dentistry & prides himself on his patient interaction chairside.

He lives in Cinnaminson with his wife Jayme & three boys, Jack, Matthew & Noah. When not in the office, Dr. Bundy enjoys visiting his oldest son in Arizona & watching his younger sons play sports.

Daniel Campeas, DMD

Dr. Daniel A. Campeas grew up in northern New Jersey. He attended college at the University of Wisconsin–Madison & then continued his education at the Temple University Kornberg School of Dentistry. Following graduation, he completed additional training in general dentistry at the Montefiore Medical Center in the Bronx, NY.

With an innate artistic ability, Dr. Campeas excels at cosmetic & implant dentistry. Prior to joining Lakeview Dental Care, he spent time as an attending at Morristown Medical Center in the General Practice Residency Program. While there, Dr. Campeas helped educate the next generation of dentists with his esthetic approach.

In his spare time, Dr. Campeas enjoys the beach, crosswords & spending time with his wife & dog.

Louis Abenante, DMD

Dr. Louis Abenante was born & raised in South Jersey & is local to Linwood. After graduating with a Bachelor of Science in biology from Villanova University, Dr. Abenante pursued his dental education at Temple University where he graduated with honors. His commitment to serving his community drives his practice philosophy, emphasizing compassionate care & strong doctor-patient relationships.

Dr. Abenante’s professional journey is marked by his commitment to providing top-quality dentistry while treating each patient like family. He’s an active member of the American Dental Association & pursues ongoing education to stay current with the latest advancements. Dr. Abenante is dedicated to creating a soothing environment for his patients, ensuring they receive comprehensive & comfortable dental care. Whether through cosmetic treatments or routine procedures, he strives to provide exceptional care & promote oral health awareness.

Beyond dentistry, Dr. Abenante enjoys an active lifestyle, playing tennis, exploring the beach with his dog & spending time with family & friends. His roots in South Jersey inspire his dedication to enhancing dental health & wellbeing in the community he calls home.

Jessica Micale, DMD

Dr. Jessica Micale, a proud native of central New Jersey, graduated from the esteemed Temple University Kornberg School of Dentistry. Dr. Micale provides comprehensive dental care for all ages & is skilled in performing complex procedures. She excels in diagnosing acute & emergent conditions, esthetics & comprehensive treatment planning.

Known for her caring & compassionate nature, Dr. Micale is committed to offering personalized treatment options tailored to each patient’s unique needs. She explains procedures & treatments, actively listening to a patient’s concerns & answering all questions. Dr. Micale strives to create a comfortable & calming environment for everyone. Her empathetic approach & dedication have earned her high praise from patients, as she consistently delivers results that enhance smiles & boost confidence.

Outside of the office, Dr. Micale enjoys exploring Philadelphia’s vibrant culture. She is passionate about fitness & finds joy in artistic pursuits, which offer a creative balance to her scientific expertise in dentistry. Above all, she cherishes spending time with her close-knit family & friends.

Dr. Micale looks forward to meeting you & helping you achieve a healthy, beautiful smile.

Meet Our Caring Staff

Our Exceptional, Friendly Staff is Our Greatest Asset

All of our dental assistants & hygienists are licensed professionals who pride themselves on their current dental techniques & outstanding patient communication. With unmatched quality & integrity, they are dedicated to achieving the best possible results for you & your family. Since your comfort & health are our top priorities, Lakeview Dental Care’s staff is glad to assist you in any way. If you have any questions at all, from treatment options & sterilization to insurance concerns & paperwork, we’re here for you! We can assure you that you’ll enjoy your dental visit!

What Makes Us Different

At our community-focused practice, your comfort & satisfaction come first. We offer convenient appointments, so you don’t have to miss work or school for your care, something our team feels strongly about.

We pride ourselves on taking the time to listen & get to know each patient as an individual. The entire team at Lakeview Dental Care looks forward to seeing you soon & developing a relationship with you to build the bridge toward long-term trust & successful dental care.
